quoteText: Should any part of these Terms and Conditions be rendered or declared invalid by an appropriate authority, such invalidation of such part or portion of these Terms and Conditions should not invalidate the remaining portions thereof, and they shall remain in full force and effect.
title: Invalidity of any portion of the Terms of Service does not entail invalidity of its remainder

tosdr.case: Invalidity of any portion of the Terms of Service does not entail invalidity of its remainder
